languages.text: "Лорд-капитан... поясните мне, что вы делаете? Даже не так: отдаете ли вы себе отчет в том, что вы делаете?"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан... поясните мне, что вы делаете? Даже не так: отдаете ли вы себе отчет в том, что вы делаете?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain... I need an explanation. What are you doing? No, that's not even the right question — do you realise what you are doing?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан... поясните мне, что вы делаете? Даже не так: отдаете ли вы себе отчет в том, что вы делаете?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain... I need an explanation. What are you doing? No, that's not even the right question — do you realise what you are doing?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain... I need an explanation. What are you doing? No, that's not even the right question — do you realise what you are doing?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain... I need an explanation. What are you doing? No, that's not even the right question — do you realise what you are doing?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain... I need an explanation. What are you doing? No, that's not even the right question — do you realise what you are doing?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人……我需要一个解释。你究竟在做什么事情？不，我应该换个问法。你有没有意识到你在做什么事情？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... I need an explanation. What are you doing? No, that's not even the right question — do you realise what you are doing?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人……我需要一个解释。你究竟在做什么事情？不，我应该换个问法。你有没有意识到你在做什么事情？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán... necesito una explicación. ¿Qué está haciendo? No, esa no es la pregunta correcta. ¿Es acaso consciente de lo que está haciendo?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... I need an explanation. What are you doing? No, that's not even the right question — do you realise what you are doing?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán... necesito una explicación. ¿Qué está haciendo? No, esa no es la pregunta correcta. ¿Es acaso consciente de lo que está haciendo?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…説明をしてほしい。あなたは何をしているんだ？いや、それは適切な質問でもないな…自分が何をしているのかわかっているのか？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... I need an explanation. What are you doing? No, that's not even the right question — do you realise what you are doing?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン…説明をしてほしい。あなたは何をしているんだ？いや、それは適切な質問でもないな…自分が何をしているのかわかっているのか？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... J'attends des explications. Qu'est-ce que vous faites ? Non, ce n'est pas la bonne question... Vous rendez-vous compte de ce que vous êtes en train de faire ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... I need an explanation. What are you doing? No, that's not even the right question — do you realise what you are doing?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... J'attends des explications. Qu'est-ce que vous faites ? Non, ce n'est pas la bonne question... Vous rendez-vous compte de ce que vous êtes en train de faire ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain ... Ich brauche eine Erklärung. Was tut Ihr da? Nein, das ist nicht mal die richtige Frage – ist Euch klar, was Ihr da tut?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... I need an explanation. What are you doing? No, that's not even the right question — do you realise what you are doing?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain ... Ich brauche eine Erklärung. Was tut Ihr da? Nein, das ist nicht mal die richtige Frage – ist Euch klar, was Ihr da tut?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan... Açıklama talep ediyorum. Tam olarak ne yapıyorsun? Hayır, yanlış bir soru oldu bu. Tam olarak ne yaptığının farkında mısın?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain... I need an explanation. What are you doing? No, that's not even the right question — do you realise what you are doing?"
